title: 有大佬知道这是怎么意思么。
author: may2014
txt_content:
has run out of memory
This could be caused by a bug in the game or by the java virtual machine not being allocated enugh memory
to prevebt level corruption the current game has quit
we've tried to free up enough memory to let you go back to the main and back to playing but this may not have worked please restart the game if you see this message again

replies.author: huodake
replies.txt_content:
may2014 发表于 2019-8-12 23:34
咱不知道欸。
你去搞个64位java 然后内存调高点就没事了 这个是内存溢出导致的崩溃

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: huodake
replies.txt_content: 内存溢出了，内存上限调高点 java32最多1024 换成64位调到2048或者4096应该就没事了

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
启动器设置内存2048
如果不行
卸载原来的java
安装这个java
https://pan.baidu.com/s/1JWfFaMSQyvs9wd3s6x_1cg
然后启动器设置内存2048
